original_text:
By the word of the Lord the heavens were made,
    and by the breath of his mouth all their host.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀으로 하늘이 지음이 되었으며 그 만상을 그의 입 기운으로 이루었도다

sentences.original_text: By the word of the Lord the heavens were made,
and by the breath of his mouth all their host.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 입김으로 그 모든 군대가 이루어졌네.
